info.title: Physical Inventory Documents - Read, Create
info.description: You can count items and post differences on both document and item level. The service can be consumed by external systems.

x-sap-shortText: Use this synchronous inbound service to read and create physical inventory documents

values.text: [Physical Inventory - Inventory Count and Adjustment(BML)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/BML " Link To BP ")
[Physical Inventory - Inventory Count and Adjustment(OML)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/OML " Link To BP ")

get.summary: Reads information on physical inventory document header level
get.description: Reads physical inventory document header information to get an overview of the physical inventory document postings.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

post.description: Creates a physical inventory document compost by header and item to be counted.

get.summary: Reads information on physical inventory items level
get.description: Reads physical inventory document items information to get an overview of the physical inventory document postings.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

get.summary: Reads information of serial numbers on physical inventory document items level
get.description: Reads information of serial numbers of physical inventory document items to get an overview of the book and counted serial numbers.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

post.summary: Creates the material document for the differences
post.description: Creates the material document for the differences between book and counted quantities of the physical inventory document.

parameters.name: PostingThresholdValue
parameters.description:
Threshold Value  
(Value needs to be suffixed with `M`)

parameters.name: PostingDate
parameters.description:
Posting Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

parameters.name: PhysicalInventoryDocument
parameters.description:
Phys. Inventory Doc.  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: FiscalYear
parameters.description:
Fiscal Year  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.summary: Creates the material document for the differences for a specific physical inventory document item
post.description: Creates the material document for the differences between book and counted quantities of the physical inventory document for a specific physical inventory document item.

parameters.name: PhysicalInventoryDocumentItem
parameters.description:
Item  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: Material
parameters.description:
Material  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: PhysicalInventoryDocument
parameters.description:
Phys. Inventory Doc.  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: FiscalYear
parameters.description:
Fiscal Year  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: Batch
parameters.description:
Batch  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: ReasonForPhysInvtryDifference
parameters.description:
Reason f. Diff.  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: PostingDate
parameters.description:
Posting Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_PhysInventoryDocHeader HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
